column5: Just wanted to ask if anybody has heard of any progress or failure to stop the invasion of Asian Carp. Was a hot topic weeks back but just wanted to bring it up again.  Link Posted before-7 min video with some fact's and feedback  http://espn.go.com/video/clip?id=5796372  Thanks,  MTBF
great video. Loved the redneck fishing haha. As much as the situation sucks, they sure know how to make some fun out of it.  Here's hoping that electrical barrier works
